[[File:LeafStone.jpg|thumb|200px|The Leaf Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Leaf Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]] It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Saffron City]] in [[Kanto]] and [[Shops#Hoenn:_Locations_and_items|Fortree City]] in [[Hoenn]]. It can also be mined from the [[Underground]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Nuzleaf || | Shiftry |- | Gloom || | Vileplume |- | Weepinbell || | Victreebel |- | Exeggcute || | Exeggutor |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
